DataElement.preferredName: Disease And Treatment Experience School Or Impact Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A description of the disease and treatment experience school or work impact scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disease or Disorder And Therapeutic Procedure Experience School Or Occupation Impact
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._The accumulation of knowledge or skill that results from direct participation in events or activities._An educational institution._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._The principal activity that a person does to earn money._The effect or consequence of an event or condition.

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.
An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
The accumulation of knowledge or skill that results from direct participation in events or activities.
